pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``aioymaps`` is an asynchronous library provides API to fetch json informationabout transport stops from Yandex MapsRequirements============``aioymaps`` requires python 3.5 or higher due to async/await syntax and aiohttplibraryInstallation============Use pip to install the library::: pip install aioymapsOr install manually.:: sudo python ./setup.py installUsage=====:: from aioymaps import YandexMapsRequester requester = YandexMapsRequester() data = await requester.get_stop_info('stop__10067199') print(data)Or you can use it in your shell::: python -m aioymaps -s group__219
